backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor handling user profiles, conversations, query entries with optional photo blobs, and authorization via mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old conversation/query-entry formats to new ones by adding a nullable photo field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend files, components, and test IDs supporting photo upload and message attachment features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all major frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, conversation handling, information retrieval, TTS, voice settings, and photo-attached messages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication control that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their display name with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Provides a message composer with text, voice input, and photo attachment support, handling submission and local preview state.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatEmptySt: Displays a welcoming empty-state view with example prompts and capability hints to start a chat.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Renders the chat message list with auto-scrolling, role indicators, voice playback controls, and special formatting for recipe-style content.
frontend/src/components/chat/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for chat messages, modes, and photo attachments.
frontend/src/components/help/Capabilitie: Shows a dialog listing the assistantâ€™s capabilities and limitations.
frontend/src/components/history/Conversa: Provides a sidebar for listing, selecting, creating, and exporting conversation histories.
frontend/src/components/settings/VoiceSe: Dialog for choosing voice response modes and warning users if voice features are unsupported.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on user identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversationHistor: Manages conversation lists, active conversation state, and saving or creating conversation entries tied to user authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInformationRetriev: Fetches Wikipedia and DuckDuckGo results, summarizes snippets, and handles partial failures and cooking-specific formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query for profiles, conversations, entries, and mutations like create, add, and delete.
Implements browser speech-to-text with recording control, error handling, and transcript management.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Provides text-to-speech capabilities with speak/stop controls, state tracking, and error handling.
Stores and updates the user's voice response mode in localStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/cooking.ts: Detects cooking-related prompts and formats structured cooking responses by extracting ingredients, steps, and tips.
frontend/src/utils/downloadJson.ts: Generates and downloads a JSON file from provided data using a Blob and temporary link.
frontend/src/utils/summarize.ts: Creates a short summary from snippets by extracting initial sentences or truncating long text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, container settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, including features, issues, and new feature requests for photo uploads and data export.
